mapper.insert: insert into wx_equipment (eqpt_id, device_id, eqpt_name, imei, imsi, eqpt_sn, eqpt_type, power, voltage, electricity, register, eqpt_addr, latitude, longitude, user_id, site_id, role_id, group_id, last_report_time, add_time, iccid, imgs, province, city, district) values (#{eqptId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deviceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{eqptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imei,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imsi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eqptSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eqptType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{power,jdbcType=REAL}, #{voltage,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{electricity,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{register,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{eqptAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{latitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{longitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{siteId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{roleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{groupId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lastReportTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{iccid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imgs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{district,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update wx_equipment
device_id = #{deviceId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
eqpt_name = #{eqptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
imei = #{imei,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
imsi = #{imsi,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
eqpt_sn = #{eqptSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
eqpt_type = #{eqptType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
power = #{power,jdbcType=REAL},
voltage = #{voltage,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
electricity = #{electricity,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
register = #{register,jdbcType=TINYINT},
eqpt_addr = #{eqptAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
latitude = #{latitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
longitude = #{longitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
site_id = #{siteId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
role_id = #{roleId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
group_id = #{groupId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
last_report_time = #{lastReportTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
iccid = #{iccid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
imgs = #{imgs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
district = #{district,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where eqpt_id = #{eqptId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update wx_equipment
eqpt_name = #{eqptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
eqpt_addr = #{eqptAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
latitude = #{latitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
longitude = #{longitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
role_id = #{roleId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
district = #{district,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where imei = #{imei,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update wx_equipment set device_id = #{deviceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, eqpt_name = #{eqptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, imei = #{imei,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, imsi = #{imsi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, eqpt_sn = #{eqptSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, eqpt_type = #{eqptType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, power = #{power,jdbcType=REAL}, voltage = #{voltage,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, electricity = #{electricity,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, register = #{register,jdbcType=TINYINT}, eqpt_addr = #{eqptAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, latitude = #{latitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, longitude = #{longitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, site_id = #{siteId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, role_id = #{roleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, group_id = #{groupId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, last_report_time = #{lastReportTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, iccid = #{iccid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, imgs = #{imgs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, district = #{district,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where eqpt_id = #{eqptId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

choose.when:
SELECT wxe.eqpt_id,wxe.eqpt_name,wxe.imei,wxe.eqpt_sn, wxe.eqpt_addr,wxe.latitude,wxe.longitude, wxe.user_id, wxe.province,wxe.city,wxe.district,e.eqpt_type FROM wx_user_equipment wue RIGHT JOIN wx_equipment wxe on wue.eqpt_id = wxe.eqpt_id INNER JOIN equipment e on wxe.imei = e.imei WHERE wue.user_id = #{wxEquipment.userId}
AND wxe.imei = #{wxEquipment.imei}
choose.otherwise:
SELECT wxe.eqpt_id,wxe.eqpt_name,wxe.imei,wxe.eqpt_sn, wxe.eqpt_addr,wxe.latitude,wxe.longitude, wxe.user_id, wxe.province,wxe.city,wxe.district,e.eqpt_type FROM wx_user_equipment wue RIGHT JOIN wx_equipment wxe on wue.eqpt_id = wxe.eqpt_id INNER JOIN equipment e on wxe.imei = e.imei WHERE 1 = 1
AND wxe.imei = #{wxEquipment.imei}

mapper.delete: delete from wx_user_equipment where eqpt_id = #{eqptId} and user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT we.eqpt_id,wue.user_id FROM wx_user_equipment wue INNER JOIN wx_equipment we on wue.eqpt_id = we.eqpt_id where we.imei = #{imei,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and wue.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT wxe.eqpt_id,wxe.eqpt_name,wxe.imei,wxe.eqpt_sn, wxe.eqpt_addr,wxe.latitude,wxe.longitude, wxe.user_id, wxe.province,wxe.city,wxe.district,e.eqpt_type as eqptType,s.SHARER_USER_ID as sharerId FROM `share` s inner JOIN wx_equipment wxe on s.IMEI = wxe.imei INNER JOIN equipment e on wxe.imei = e.imei WHERE s.IMEI in ( SELECT s.IMEI FROM share s WHERE s.SHARER_USER_ID = #{userId} )
